title: NightFall Gaming Teams are looking for more!
body:
NightFall is a community consisting of 100+ Active every day players and Teams.

We are doing Flex Games Daily and Bi-Montly LCS style tournaments with Prizes.

At the Moment I am looking for All roles!
MUST BE GOLD OR ABOVE in at least FLEX OR SOLO/DUO

Our play times are normally 8-10ish Pm Eastern with one of the teams being 6pm east+.

Discord is a must, Toxicity is Not allowed.

For the application you can either leave it in here this format

IGN
AGE
Whether or not you can make the times
Main role and top 5 champs (if support list your secondary)

IF not Just add me in game at NF Shido

{{sticker:vlad-salute}}

replies.body:
IGN: Jungle Beats
AGE: 19
Whether or not you can make the times: yes
Main role and top 5 champs (if support list your secondary): Mid = Anivia, Syndra, Lucian, Corki, and Viktor... Honestly i play all the roles and almost all the champs but 3

IGN: Hi Im Cryion
AGE: 18
Whether or not you can make the times: Yes I can!
Main role and top 5 champs: ADC/Support - Vayne, Xayah, Ashe, Sona, Rakan

IGN selfz
AGE 22
Whether or not you can make the times yes
Main role and top 5 champs (if support list your secondary) adc - cait vayne draven twitch lucian
